languages.language: Kurdish, Central (translation hint: A form of the name that will sort next to Kurdish, if the standard name does not already do that.)
Kurdish, Sorani (translation hint: An alternate form using Sorani or Central, whichever is not used by the standard name.)

scripts.script: Nastaliq (translation hint: Special code identifies a style variant of Arabic script.)
Simplified (translation hint: This version of the script name is used in combination with the language name for Chinese.)
Simplified Han (translation hint: This version of the script name is used in isolation, not combined with the language name for Chinese.)
Traditional (translation hint: This version of the script name is used in combination with the language name for Chinese.)
Traditional Han (translation hint: This version of the script name is used in isolation, not combined with the language name for Chinese.)
Zawgyi (translation hint: Special code identifies non-standard Myanmar encoding for use with Zawgyi font.)

types.type: Minguo Calendar (translation hint: also called "Republic of China Calendar", "Republican Calendar")

long.standard: South Africa Standard Time [translation hint: translate as just "South Africa Time"]

long.generic: Central Time [translation hint: translate as "North American Central Time"]
long.standard: Central Standard Time [translation hint: translate as "North American Central Standard Time"]
long.daylight: Central Daylight Time [translation hint: translate as "North American Central Daylight Time"]

long.generic: Eastern Time [translation hint: translate as "North American Eastern Time"]
long.standard: Eastern Standard Time [translation hint: translate as "North American Eastern Standard Time"]
long.daylight: Eastern Daylight Time [translation hint: translate as "North American Eastern Daylight Time"]

long.generic: Mountain Time [translation hint: translate as "North American Mountain Time"]
long.standard: Mountain Standard Time [translation hint: translate as "North American Mountain Standard Time"]
long.daylight: Mountain Daylight Time [translation hint: translate as "North American Mountain Daylight Time"]

long.generic: Pacific Time [translation hint: translate as "North American Pacific Time"]
long.standard: Pacific Standard Time [translation hint: translate as "North American Pacific Standard Time"]
long.daylight: Pacific Daylight Time [translation hint: translate as "North American Pacific Daylight Time"]

long.standard: Chamorro Standard Time [translation hint: translate as just "Chamorro Time"]
Guam Standard Time [translation hint: translate as just "Guam Time"]
Gulf Standard Time [translation hint: translate as just "Gulf Time"]
India Standard Time [translation hint: translate as just "India Time"]
Singapore Standard Time [translation hint: translate as just "Singapore Time"]
